title: Magnificent Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '300g sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g mashed banana', '4 tablespoons soured cream', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '250g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '170g plain chocolate chips']
